<h3 id="X38036">X(38036) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(1), X(4), X(7)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^6+(b+c)*a^5-4*(b^2+b*c+c^2)*a^4-2*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a^3+(5*b^2+2*b*c+5*c^2)*(b-c)^2*a^2+(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*(b^2+6*b*c+c^2)*a-2*(b^2-c^2)^2*(b-c)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38036) = X(1)+2*X(5805) = X(1)-4*X(20330) = X(4)+2*X(5542) = 4*X(5)-X(5223) = X(7)+2*X(946) = 2*X(7)+X(11372) = 2*X(9)-5*X(8227) = X(40)-4*X(142) = X(390)-4*X(13464) = 4*X(946)-X(11372) = X(4312)+5*X(11522) = 3*X(5587)-2*X(38154) = X(5805)+2*X(20330) = 2*X(6173)+X(31162) = 3*X(38024)-2*X(38030) = 3*X(38024)-4*X(38041) = 3*X(38052)-2*X(38121) = 3*X(38052)-4*X(38172) = 3*X(38107)-X(38121) = 3*X(38107)-2*X(38172)</b>
<p>X(38036) lies on these lines: {1,5805}, {2,38130}, {4,5542}, {5,5223}, {7,84}, {9,6832}, {11,10398}, {30,38024}, {40,142}, {56,4312}, {165,38122}, {354,971}, {376,516}, {390,13464}, {480,6918}, {496,30330}, {515,11038}, {517,38052}, {518,5587}, {519,38073}, {527,38021}, {952,38137}, {954,22753}, {960,5833}, {990,2191}, {1001,5735}, {1125,5759}, {1156,16174}, {1385,31671}, {1503,38046}, {2346,6796}, {2550,7982}, {2829,4321}, {2886,5785}, {2951,12699}, {3062,5557}, {3243,5881}, {3254,6326}, {3338,3358}, {3545,38158}, {3624,31658}, {3646,5758}, {3817,5817}, {4301,35514}, {5055,38179}, {5219,15298}, {5290,5806}, {5657,38204}, {5686,10175}, {5691,18482}, {5715,5728}, {5732,25557}, {5762,5886}, {5779,9955}, {5804,18492}, {5842,38056}, {5843,38034}, {5845,38035}, {5851,38038}, {5852,38039}, {5853,16200}, {7672,31870}, {7965,30304}, {7988,31142}, {8273,9589}, {8581,9612}, {8727,10980}, {9581,18412}, {9614,14100}, {9779,31164}, {9845,11037}, {10384,30384}, {10392,10591}, {10427,14217}, {10595,30331}, {11544,18222}, {12005,12669}, {13159,21669}, {15251,16469}, {15841,21628}, {16173,24644}, {18483,30340}, {19875,38126}, {20119,25485}, {20195,24468}, {21168,38059}, {25055,38031}, {26446,38171}, {27475,29054}, {28174,38111}, {28194,38123}, {28198,38065}, {30275,31393}</p>
<p>
X(38036) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (165, 38122), (3576, 38053), (5587, 38150), (5657, 38204), (5686, 10175), (5817, 3817), (21151, 38054), (21168, 38059), (26446, 38171), (38030, 38041), (38052, 38107), (38121, 38172), (38149, 38151)<br>
X(38036) = anticomplement of X(38130)<br>
X(38036) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (7, 946, 11372), (5805, 20330, 1), (12699, 31657, 2951), (38030, 38041, 38024), (38073, 38149, 38151), (38107, 38121, 38172), (38121, 38172, 38052), (38152, 38153, 38137)<br>
</p>
